uktam parasya āmiṣa tām an uktam yāti adṛśya tām

original: hṛdaye śalyatāṃ dhatte nidhane dhanināṃ dhanam // KDarp_2.6 //
analyzed: hṛdaye śalya tām dhatte nidhane dhaninām dhanam
dhanena jīvitena iva kaṇṭha sthena nirīkṣate
paryante bandhūnām mukham āturaḥ
yat arjitam parikleśaiḥ arjitam yat na bhujyate
vibhajyate yad ante nyaḥ kasyacid mā astu tat dhanam

original: vidyā vivādāya dhanaṃ madāya prajñāprakarṣaḥ paravañcanāya /
analyzed: vidyā vivādāya dhanam madāya prajñā prakarṣaḥ para vañcanāya

original: atyunnatirlokaparābhavāya yeṣāṃ prakāśastimiraṃ hi teṣām // KDarp_2.9 //
analyzed: ati unnatiḥ loka parābhavāya yeṣām prakāśaḥ timiram hi teṣām
aśānta antaḥ tṛṣṇā dhana lavaṇa vāri vyatikaraiḥ gata chāyaḥ kāyaḥ cira virasa rūkṣa aśana tayā

original: anidrā mando 'gnirnṛpasalilacaurānalabhayāt kadaryāṇāṃ kaṣṭaṃ sphuṭamadhanakaṣṭādapi param // KDarp_2.10 //
analyzed: anidrā mandaḥ gniḥ nṛpa salila caura anala bhayāt kadaryāṇām kaṣṭam sphuṭam adhana kaṣṭāt api param
śrāvastyām sārthavāhaḥ bhūt artha nāthaḥ iva aparaḥ

sa kadaryaḥ sadā janasya udvega duḥsahaḥ

kṛtvā samastam divasam dhanānām nidhāna kumbhī gaṇanā vidhānam

original: sa lājapeyāpalamānaśīlam aśnāti rātrāvudaraṃ saśūlam (?) // KDarp_2.13 //
analyzed: sa lāja peyā pala māna śīlam aśnāti rātrau udaram sa śūlam

adṛṣṭa hāsam vyaya saṃnirodhāt tasya abhavat veśma sa śoka mūkam
tasya kaṣṭam kadaryasya para lokam abhūt gṛham
sa bhakta saṃcaye nityam abhaktaḥ saṃtata āmayaiḥ
suvarṇavān vivarṇaḥ bhūt saṃpūrṇaḥ cintayā kṛśaḥ
puṇya prāpyā matiḥ nāma dhanarddhiḥ iva rūpiṇī
bhāryā abhūt tad ayogyasya tasya daiva viparyayāt
sadā pracchādya sā bhartuḥ cakāra atithi satkriyām
tena vyaya vivādeṣu śoṣitā kalaha agninā
tasyām tasya abhavat sūnuḥ saguṇaḥ candana abhidhaḥ

original: pitrā lobhāndhakāreṇa nītaḥ padma ivānyatām // KDarp_2.19 //
analyzed: pitrā lobha andhakāreṇa nītaḥ padmaḥ iva anya tām

original: cakāra kalahaṃ nandaḥ patnyā śoṇitapātanam // KDarp_2.20 //
analyzed: cakāra kalaham nandaḥ patnyā śoṇita pātanam
saḥ vadat kopa daṣṭa oṣṭhaḥ śvasan bhāryām adhomukhīm
tad sparsa pāpam stanayoḥ kṣālayantīm iva aśrubhiḥ
mama dāsyati kaḥ bhikṣām tvad pāṇi kṣīṇa saṃpadaḥ

original: dāridryajananī yasya sthitā tvaṃ durbhagā gṛhe // KDarp_2.22 //
analyzed: dāridrya jananī yasya sthitā tvam durbhagā gṛhe

original: gṛhaṃ bhavatyavaśyaṃ tad- āspadaṃ paramāpadām // KDarp_2.23 //
analyzed: gṛham bhavati avaśyam tat āspadam parama āpadām
gṛham ekam gṛhasthasya gṛhāṇām śatam arthinaḥ
bhāryā bharjita vittasya naṣṭā gṛhapateḥ gatiḥ
tṛpti dam darśanena api jantoḥ jīvita jīvitam

original: draviṇaṃ yena rakṣanti svakāyaṃ bhakṣayanti te // KDarp_2.25 //
analyzed: draviṇam yena rakṣanti sva kāyam bhakṣayanti te
jīvan api akriyaḥ niḥsvaḥ śavaḥ pi arthena sakriyaḥ

original: dāridryaṃ maraṇaṃ loke dhanamāyuḥ śarīriṇām // KDarp_2.26 //

etat eva artha sāmarthyam pratyakṣeṇa upalakṣyate
yat skandha bandhe jīvadbhiḥ śavaḥ śibikayā uhyate

original: dīyate yatkila prāptyai tatprāptaṃ kiṃ na rakṣyate // KDarp_2.28 //
analyzed: dīyate yat kila prāptyai tat prāptam kim na rakṣyate
putra dāra ādi saṃbandhaḥ puṃsām dhana nibandhanaḥ

original: kṣīṇātputrāḥ palāyante dārā gacchanti cānyataḥ // KDarp_2.29 //
analyzed: kṣīṇāt putrāḥ palāyante dārāḥ gacchanti ca anyatas
paṇḍitāḥ kavayaḥ śūrāḥ kalāvantaḥ tapasvinaḥ

iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛpaṇasya artha niṣkṛpam

original: sā tamūce samucitaṃ sattvasyābhijanasya ca // KDarp_2.31 //
analyzed: sā tam ūce samucitam sattvasya abhijanasya ca
santaḥ kurvanti yatnena dharmasya arthe dhana arjanam
dharma ācāra vinīnānām draviṇam mala saṃcayaḥ
yat karoti arucim kleśam tṛṣṇam moham prajāgaram

original: na taddhanaṃ kadaryāṇāṃ hṛdayavyādhireva tat // KDarp_2.33 //
analyzed: na tat dhanam kadaryāṇām hṛdaya vyādhiḥ eva tat
vardhate yaḥ dhana vyādhiḥ sukha bhoga viyoga kṛt
tasya āśu śamanam patham rāja vaidya cikitsayā
lobhāt na abhūt gṛhe yasya kadācid kaścid utsavaḥ
nṛtyanti paṭahaiḥ tasya nidhane dhana bhāginaḥ
kaṇā ācāma tuṣa aṅgārān yatnena parirakṣasi

original: mūṣakāpahṛtaṃ koṣe ratnarāśiṃ na paśyasi // KDarp_2.36 //
analyzed: mūṣaka apahṛtam koṣe ratna rāśim na paśyasi

original: dhanena darpaḥ ko nāma yatkṣaṇena vinaśyati /
analyzed: dhanena darpaḥ kaḥ nāma yad kṣaṇena vinaśyati
rakṣyamāṇam vyayena eva bhakṣyamāṇam upaplavaiḥ

na kasyāṃcid avasthāyām dhana lobhaḥ praśasyate

original: kalau kāle khale mitre putre durvyasanānvite /
analyzed: kalau kāle khale mitre putre durvyasana anvite

original: taskareṣu pravṛddheṣu lubdhe rājñi dhanena kim // KDarp_2.39 //
analyzed: taskareṣu pravṛddheṣu lubdhe rājñi dhanena kim
ṛṇikaiḥ kalahaiḥ nityam acchinna guṇanā gateḥ
dāna dviṣaḥ napatyasya manda agneḥ ca dhanena kim
sahasā āsādita arthasya rāja droha ādi pātakaiḥ
bhayāt avyaya śīlasya śalyena iva dhanena kim
ghora pratigraha grāma grasta udagra guṇa ojasaḥ
tad vibhāga anabhijñasya dhūrta āptasya dhanena kim
rātri sevā avasannasya śīta vāta ātapa sthiteḥ
prabhu dṛṣṭi prahṛṣṭasya kaṣṭa arhasya dhanena kim

original: laśunasyāśuceḥ pāka- gandheneva dhanena kim // KDarp_2.45 //
analyzed: laśunasya aśuceḥ pāka gandhena iva dhanena kim
kāṅkṣitena api alabdhena bhoga arhe nava yauvane

dhana saṃghaṭita arthasya bandhena iva dhanena kim

kṣaṇa kṣaya upayogena svapnena iva dhanena kim
bhāryayā svaira cāriṇyā grāma sthasya niyoginaḥ

original: prasabhaṃ bhujyamānena pāpāptena dhanena kim // KDarp_2.49 //
analyzed: prasabham bhujyamānena pāpa āptena dhanena kim

original: gurordambhena siddhasya saṃcitena dhanena kim // KDarp_2.50 //
analyzed: guroḥ dambhena siddhasya saṃcitena dhanena kim

analyzed: vyayena śaṅkanīyasya vadhena iva dhanena kim
ajñāta bhāvi caura ādi doṣaiḥ nitya vināśinā

niṣpāka śāka bhojyasya grāmīṇasya dhanena kim

āsanna bandhanasya ante divirasya dhanena kim

kopa upavāsa niḥśvāsa saṃtaptasya dhanena ki
malinasya ku vastrasya su alpa aśana parasya ca
dāridrya adhika kaṣṭasya kadaryasya dhanena kim
nirdhanāḥ sukhinaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ sa dhanāḥ ca ati duḥkhitāḥ

original: sukhaduḥkhodaye jāntor daivādhīne dhanena kim // KDarp_2.57 //
analyzed: sukha duḥkha udaye daiva adhīne dhanena kim
samāneṣu vyatīteṣu sva jane śūnya cetasaḥ
virasa āsāra saṃsāra viraktasya dhanena kim

ati alpa parituṣṭasya saṃtuṣṭasya dhanena kim

original: sarvauṣadheṣu viphaleṣu yadā virauti dhānyairdhanena ca tadā vada kiṃ karoti // KDarp_2.63 //

original: bhagnasvāsthyamanorathaḥ priyatamāvaṣṭabdhapādadvayaḥ paryante vapuṣaḥ karoti puruṣaḥ kiṃ śalyatulyairdhanaiḥ // KDarp_2.64 //
analyzed: bhagna svāsthya manorathaḥ priyatama avaṣṭabdha pāda dvayaḥ paryante vapuṣaḥ karoti puruṣaḥ kim śalya tulyaiḥ dhanaiḥ

original: nimeṣamātraṃ labhate na jīvaṃ kālena kāle śikhayā gṛhītaḥ // KDarp_2.65 //

original: nīto vasiṣṭhena ruṣābhiśaptaś caṇḍālatāṃ bhūmipatistraśaṅkuḥ // KDarp_7.5 //
analyzed: nītaḥ vasiṣṭhena ruṣā abhiśaptaḥ caṇḍāla tām bhūmipati stra śaṅkuḥ
bhū magna mūrtiḥ vara ratna lobhāt vipāṭayantīm nayane sukanyām

original: tatpāṇisaṃsparśasukhādareṇa sehe nikāraṃ cyavanaḥ sarāgaḥ // KDarp_7.6 //
analyzed: tad pāṇi saṃsparśa sukha ādareṇa sehe nikāram cyavanaḥ sa rāgaḥ
pāṇḍuḥ priyā kaṇṭha vilambi bāhuḥ yayau stana nyasta tanuḥ yat astam

original: dagdhaḥ parīkṣitphaṇiphūtkṛtairyat tapasvikopasya vijṛmbhitaṃ tat // KDarp_7.7 //
analyzed: dagdhaḥ parīkṣit phaṇi phūtkṛtaiḥ yat tapasvi kopasya vijṛmbhitam tat
visāra saṃsāra taroḥ na yena niḥśeṣam unmūlitam eva mūlam

original: śāpopatāpaprabhuṇā pareṣāṃ kiṃ tena mithyātapasā munīnām // KDarp_7.8 //
analyzed: śāpa upatāpa prabhuṇā pareṣām kim tena mithyā tapasā munīnām
na rāja sevā rajasā viluptam na bhūmi vidyā ādi vivāda taptam

original: na dambhadīkṣākuhakākulaṃ yat kalyāṇamittraṃ vimalaṃ vrataṃ tat // KDarp_7.9 //
analyzed: na dambha dīkṣā kuhaka ākulam yat kalyāṇa mittram vimalam vratam tat
sa saṃcayam gupta kalatra putram punar gṛhīta vyavāhara bhāram
dambha abhimāna udbhava kaṣṭa bhūtam mithyāvratam jīvita vṛtti upāyaḥ
sa rāga rogam bahula pramoham sa roga saṃbhāram akharva garvam
pradveṣa doṣa uṣṇam ameya māyam saṃsāra cihnam vratam etat agryam
jaṭā akṣasūtra ajina yoga paṭṭa kanyā dṛḍha granthi nipīḍyamānam
viveka hīnam virata prakāśam vratam bṛhat bandhanam āmananti
sa rāga kāṣāya kaṣāya cittam śīla aṃśuka tyāga digambaram vā
laulya udbhavat bhasma bhara prahāsam vratam na veṣa udbhaṭa tulya vṛttam
niḥsaṅga yogam dhana bhoga saṅgam vilambi kaṅkāla kapāla mālam

original: kopākulaṃ sparśavivarjanīyaṃ bhāravrataṃ tatkathayanti pāpam // KDarp_7.14 //
analyzed: kopa ākulam sparśa vivarjanīyam bhāra vratam tat kathayanti pāpam

original: bālastapasvī kimato 'sti hāsyaṃ yuvā vanaiṣī kimato 'styayogyam /
analyzed: bālaḥ tapasvī kim atas sti hāsyam yuvā vanaiṣī kim atas sti ayogyam

original: vṛddha sarāgaḥ kimato 'sti nindyaṃ mūrkhaḥ pramātā kimato 'sti śocyam // KDarp_7.15 //
analyzed: vṛddha sa rāgaḥ kim atas sti nindyam mūrkhaḥ pramātā kim atas sti śocyam

original: kṣamā śamaḥ śāsanamindriyāṇāṃ manaḥ prasiktaṃ karuṇāmṛtena /
analyzed: kṣamā śamaḥ śāsanam indriyāṇām manaḥ prasiktam karuṇā amṛtena

original: tapo 'rhametatsajane vane vā kāyasya saṃśoṣaṇamanyadāhuḥ // KDarp_7.16 //
analyzed: tapaḥ rham etat sa jane vane vā kāyasya saṃśoṣaṇam anyat āhuḥ
himācale śyāmala devadāru vane purā nirjhara cāru hāsye

original: tapasyatāṃ śoṣajuṣāṃ munīnāṃ kālo yayau varṣasahasrasaṃkhyaḥ // KDarp_7.17 //
analyzed: tapasyatām śoṣa juṣām munīnām kālaḥ yayau varṣa sahasra saṃkhyaḥ
tatas kadācid bhagavān bhava ārti hārī vihārāya nabhaḥpathena

original: samaṃ bhavānyā vṛṣabhādhirūḍhaḥ samāyayau śītamayūkhamauliḥ // KDarp_7.18 //
analyzed: samam bhavānyā vṛṣabha adhirūḍhaḥ samāyayau śīta mayūkha mauliḥ
tasya uditānām vadana prabhāṇām dīrghīkṛta aneka śaśi prabhāṇām
vilāsa hāsyena nabhaḥ babhūva vibhakti saṃsakta sita uttarīyam
devī vilokya atha tapaḥ prayatna tīvra prayāsa prakaṭa asthi śeṣān
munīn kṛpā āveśa viṣaṇṇa cittā śaśāṅka lekhā ābharaṇam babhāṣe
deva tvad ārādhana niścalānām saṃtyakta sarva āgraha nigrahāṇām

original: tapa kriyāśoṣitavigrahāṇāṃ nādyāpi muktiḥ kimaho munīnām // KDarp_7.21 //
analyzed: tapa kriyā śoṣita vigrahāṇām na adyā api muktiḥ kim aho munīnām
kasmāt amī varṣa sahasra lagna kleśa avalagnāḥ tanu śoṣa magnāḥ

original: bhavatpadaṃ nityasukhāya naiva nirāmayaṃ tanmunayaḥ prayānti // KDarp_7.22 //
analyzed: bhavat padam nitya sukhāya nā eva nirāmayam tat munayaḥ prayānti
pṛthuḥ prasādaḥ prathama āgateṣu nirādara tvam cira saṃśriteṣu

original: svācchandyalīlāvipulāvalepād eṣu svabhāvaḥ sulabhaḥ prabhūṇām // KDarp_7.23 //
analyzed: svācchandya līlā vipula avalepāt eṣu svabhāvaḥ sulabhaḥ prabhūṇām

original: iti priyāyāḥ praṇayopapannam ākarṇya vākyaṃ giriśo 'bravīttām /
analyzed: iti priyāyāḥ praṇaya upapannam ākarṇya vākyam giriśaḥ bravīt tām
kurvan viṣa śyāmala kaṇṭha kāntim danta prabhābhiḥ pratibhā vihīnam

original: devi tvayoktam dayayā munīnāṃ bhaktānurodhāducitaṃ mamaitat /
analyzed: devi tvayā uktam dayayā munīnām bhakta anurodhāt ucitam mama etat

original: eṣāṃ bhavollaṅganavighnabhūtau śāntiṃ gatau kiṃ tu na kāmakopau // KDarp_7.25 //
analyzed: eṣām bhava ullaṅgana vighna bhūtau śāntim gatau kim tu na kāma kopau
vana praveśaiḥ niyamaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ kriyā viśeṣaiḥ kṛta kāya śoṣaiḥ

original: na nirvikāraṃ padamāpnuvanti kopena kāmena ca kṛṣyamāṇāḥ // KDarp_7.26 //
analyzed: na nirvikāram padam āpnuvanti kopena kāmena ca kṛṣyamāṇāḥ
pratyakṣam eṣām manasaḥ vikāram saṃdarśayāmi eṣa niṣaktam antar

original: tīvravrataiḥ śuṣyati kāya eva na vāsanālīnaghanapramohaḥ // KDarp_7.27 //
analyzed: tīvra vrataiḥ śuṣyati kāyaḥ eva na vāsanā līna ghana pramohaḥ
saṃtyakta bhogāḥ spṛhayā vimuktāḥ snehe pi a rāgāḥ su jane pi a saṅgāḥ

original: bhajantyavikleśatapaḥprasaktā yuktāḥ prakāmaṃ padamavyayaṃ tat // KDarp_7.28 //
analyzed: bhajanti a vikleśa tapaḥ prasaktāḥ yuktāḥ prakāmam padam avyayam tat
uktvā iti śaṃbhuḥ vṛṣabhāt sa līlam gireḥ iva agrāt avatīrya bhūmim
kṣaṇāt abhūt adbhuta rūpa rāśiḥ nagna vrataḥ kānti sudhā avadātaḥ
tasya amara adhīśa kirīṭa ratna śoṇa prabhā ārdrau iva pāda padmau
pracakratuḥ vidruma bāla vallī nava praroha adbhuta garvam urvyām
su spaṣṭa jānu pracita ūru śobhi nābhi hrada āvarta vibhakta madhyam
tat tasya rūpam pravilambi bāhoḥ pīna aṃsam āsīt mukha pūrṇa candram
an anya lāvaṇya sudhā abdhi madhya snātaiḥ iva aṅgaiḥ sphaṭika avadātaiḥ

original: cakre daśāśāḥ sa pṛthuprakāśā digambaratvādiva jātahāsāḥ // KDarp_7.32 //
analyzed: cakre daśa āśāḥ sa pṛthu prakāśāḥ digambara tvāt iva jāta hāsāḥ
pāṇi sthita śyāma mayūra piccha chāyā chaṭā vicchuritaḥ sya kaṇṭhaḥ
rarāja līna antara kālakūṭa miṣa agninā iva arpita dhūma lekhaḥ
sa locanābhyām pṛthu pakṣmalābhyām ārakta paryanta manoharābhyām
vyadhāt iva anaṅga nava aṅga saṅge diś aṅganānām anurāga dīkṣām
dṛṣṭvā trilokī kalita abhilāṣam vapuḥ smarāreḥ janita smaram tat

original: pūrvāpakārasmṛtijātalajjaṃ cakṣuḥ kṣaṇaṃ kvāpi yayau tṛtīyam // KDarp_7.35 //
analyzed: pūrva apakāra smṛti jāta lajjam cakṣuḥ kṣaṇam kvāpi yayau tṛtīyam

original: babhau sa kāntaḥ kuṭilāsitena skandhaspṛśā kuntalasaṃcayena /
analyzed: babhau sa kāntaḥ kuṭila asitena skandha spṛśā kuntala saṃcayena
anveṣṭum iṣṭām mukuṭa indu lekhām niśā gaṇena iva samāgatena
latā vadhū pallava pāṇi muktaiḥ smita avadātaiḥ vibabhau ca puṣpaiḥ
rūpa antare nihnuta jahnukanyā phena avaśeṣaiḥ iva kīrṇa keśaḥ
tena anya rūpeṇa kṛtā navā eva kāntiḥ cakāśe nija rūpa guptyai
jūṭāt iva induḥ mṛditaḥ karābhyām sarva aṅgam abhyaṅga pade niyuktaḥ
rūpam virūpīkṛta manmathasya tat tasya kāntyā kamanīyam āsīt
lajjā apahārāt vana devatānām sa vismayaḥ yena nava abhilāṣaḥ
vivāsasaḥ tasya sa saṅgam aṅge lajjāvatīnām spṛhayā eva petuḥ
netrāṇi vidyādhara sundarīṇām līlā aravinda ardha tiraskṛtāni
nabhaḥ sthitānām tridaśa aṅganānām tad gātra saundarya vaśīkṛtānām
prakampa śiñjāna vibhūṣaṇānām netra utsavaḥ bhūt gati vighna bhūtaḥ
su siddha kanyā añjali pallava agra vimukta nīlotpala puṣpa kuñjam
aṅge jagat locana vargam asya saundarya saṃsaktam iva ābabhāse
tad darśane kautuka niścalānām karṇa avataṃsīkṛta locanānām
mṛga aṅganānām api sa spṛhā abhūt nitāntam antaḥkaraṇa pravṛttiḥ
tasya praveśe vadana adhivāsa lobha bhramat bhṛṅga gaṇa āñcitānām
abhūt sa jṛmbha śvasana ākulānām muhur latānām kusumeṣu kampaḥ
śanais śanais āśrama saṃnikarṣam tam yauvanam mūrtam iva āpatantam

original: vilokya kāntaṃ munikāminīnāṃ manaḥ praharṣocchalitaṃ babhūva // KDarp_7.45 //
analyzed: vilokya kāntam muni kāminīnām manaḥ praharṣa ucchalitam babhūva
tāsām tad ālokana nirnimeṣā dṛṣṭiḥ param karṇa patha praviṣṭā
utsṛṣṭa lajjā vipula abhilāṣāt asūcayat mugdha mṛgī vilāsam
tāsām tad arcā rabhasa utthitānām srasta aṃśuka utkampi ghana stanīnām
navena kāmena khalīkṛtānām jṛmbhā bhavaḥ bhūt bhujayoḥ vilāsaḥ

original: tāsāṃ babhau romalatā mukhendu- bhītā tamaḥśrīḥ stanarakṣiteva /
analyzed: tāsām babhau roma latā mukha indu bhītā tamaḥ śrīḥ stana rakṣitā iva
rāga agni dhūma prasara agrya lekhā tanīyasī nābhi vinirgatā iva
tasya adhare cumbana lālasā iva kaṇṭhe haṭha āliṅgana sa spṛhā iva

original: hṛdi stananyāsasamutsukeva papāta dṛṣṭiḥ sahasaiva tāsām // KDarp_7.49 //
analyzed: hṛdi stana nyāsa samutsukā iva papāta dṛṣṭiḥ sahasā eva tāsām
bhṛṅga svanaiḥ āhita huṃkṛtābhiḥ puṣpyat prasūnaiḥ prasṛta smitābhiḥ

original: vātāñcitaiḥ pallavapaṇibhistā nivāryamāṇā iva mañjarībhiḥ // KDarp_7.50 //
analyzed: vāta āñcitaiḥ pallava paṇibhiḥ tāḥ nivāryamāṇāḥ iva mañjarībhiḥ
saṃtarjyamānāḥ iva homa dhūma lekhā āvalī bhrū bhramaṇena digbhiḥ

original: tasyāntike śīladukūlamukti- sajjā vilajjāḥ prasabhaṃ babhūvuḥ // KDarp_7.51 //
analyzed: tasya antike sajjāḥ vilajjāḥ prasabham babhūvuḥ
niḥśvāsinīnām smara bāṇa puṅkha pakṣa anta vātaiḥ iva kampitānām

original: tāsāṃ vilokyaiva manovikāraṃ bhrūbhaṅgabhīmā muniparṣadāsīt // KDarp_7.52 //
analyzed: tāsām vilokya eva manaḥ vikāram bhrū bhaṅga bhīmā muni parṣad āsīt
kopa utkaṭa vyāghra vidīryamāṇa kṣamā mṛgī rakta citā iva teṣām
āsanna doṣa āgama vāsara anta saṃdhyā nibhā abhūt sahasā eva dṛṣṭiḥ
daṣṭa adharāḥ kampa vidhūrṇamānāḥ sveda ārdra dehāḥ viṣamam śvasantaḥ

original: te bhejire rāgasamudgaterṣyāḥ kopākulāḥ kāmukavṛttameva // KDarp_7.54 //
analyzed: te bhejire rāga samudgata īrṣyāḥ kopa ākulāḥ kāmuka vṛttam eva
antar jvalat kopa kṛśānu dhūma saṃkāśa kṛṣṇājina baddha kakṣaḥ

original: tridaṇḍamudyamya javena kaścid abhyādravannagnatanuṃ vṛṣāṅkam // KDarp_7.55 //
analyzed: tridaṇḍam udyamya javena kaścid abhyādravat nagna tanum vṛṣāṅkam

original: bṛsīṃ samutkṣipya sakampabāhuś cikṣepa kaścitkṣamayā vihīnaḥ /
analyzed: bṛsīm samutkṣipya sa kampa bāhuḥ cikṣepa kaścid kṣamayā vihīnaḥ
yena āsanāt kṣmā virahāt iva āśu mohe nirālamba tanuḥ papāta
kamaṇḍalum kaścid akāṇḍa caṇḍa saṃrambha piṇḍīkṛta kopa tulyam

original: ādāya mohena pinākapāṇeḥ puraḥ prahārābhimukho babhūva // KDarp_7.57 //
analyzed: ādāya mohena pinākapāṇeḥ puras prahāra abhimukhaḥ babhūva
teṣām amarṣāt bhṛśam akṣamāṇām soḍhum nikāram kṣaṇam akṣamāṇām

original: prāpuḥ prayātāḥ kṣitimakṣamālā bhrūbhaṅgatāṃ tasya tapovanasya // KDarp_7.58 //
analyzed: prāpuḥ prayātāḥ kṣitim akṣa mālāḥ bhrū bhaṅga tām tasya tapaḥ vanasya
tad saṃbhramāt āśrama mañjarīṇām kampa ākulānām kusuma antara utthaiḥ
āsīt pramoha pratimaḥ ndhakāraḥ śāpa akṣa rāmaiḥ bhramaraiḥ bhramadbhiḥ
te prāpuḥ īrṣyā padam andhakāri vaktram śaśāṅka upamam īkṣamāṇāḥ
kaṇṭha sthala ālokana kālakūṭa saṃpūrita akṣāḥ iva moha mūrcchām
te tam smita prasphurita adhara agram udagra lāvaṇya viśeṣa tarṣāḥ
patnī vikāra ugra nikāram ūcuḥ kaṇṭha antara śvāsa vikīrṇa varṇāḥ

original: ko 'yaṃ vijātirviguṇaḥ kalāvān nagno vṛṣāṅkaḥ praviśatyalajjaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ yam vijātiḥ viguṇaḥ kalāvān nagnaḥ vṛṣāṅkaḥ praviśati alajjaḥ

original: pradūṣitā yena maharṣijuṣṭā gaṅgeva śuddhā lalanāvalīyam // KDarp_7.62 //
analyzed: pradūṣitā yena mahā ṛṣi juṣṭā gaṅgā iva śuddhā lalanā āvalī iyam

original: nītā pavitratvamiyaṃ munīnāṃ kāpālikeneva vanāntabhūmiḥ // KDarp_7.63 //
analyzed: nītā pavitra tvam iyam munīnām kāpālikena iva vanānta bhūmiḥ
aho bata asya pratibhā prasahya satī samāliṅgana sa spṛhasya

original: kenāpi kāmatkuhakakrameṇa kāntaṃ kṛtaṃ rūpamanena nūnam // KDarp_7.64 //
analyzed: kena api kāmat kuhaka krameṇa kāntam kṛtam rūpam anena nūnam

original: uktveti tasmai sasṛjuḥ sakopās te daṇḍapāṣāṇabṛsīśatāni /
analyzed: uktvā iti tasmai sasṛjuḥ sa kopāḥ te daṇḍa pāṣāṇa bṛsī śatāni
dveṣa āvṛta akṣṇām aviveka janmā mohaḥ pramāde gurutām upaiti

original: dūre bhavatyatha śanaiḥ śiśirāṃśumaulau teṣaṃ prakopavipulānalatāpitānām /
analyzed: dūre bhavati atha śanais śiśirāṃśumaulau prakopa vipula anala tāpitānām

original: taddarśanānusaraṇaprasṛtasya yatnaḥ patnījanasya sutarāṃ vinivartane 'bhūt // KDarp_7.66 //
analyzed: tad darśana anusaraṇa prasṛtasya yatnaḥ patnī janasya sutarām vinivartane bhūt

original: atha sa bhagavānbhargaḥ svargāpagāpṛthunirjhara- prasṛtahasitastasmādeśātkrameṇa tirohitaḥ /
analyzed: atha sa bhagavān bhargaḥ svarga āpagā pṛthu nirjhara prasṛta hasitaḥ tasmāt deśāt krameṇa tirohitaḥ

original: praśamavimalaṃ vyoma vyāpya priyāmavadatsmaya- smitasitamukhīṃ dṛṣṭaṃ devi tvayā municeṣṭitam // KDarp_7.67 //
analyzed: praśama vimalam vyoma vyāpya priyām avadat smaya smita sita mukhīm dṛṣṭam devi tvayā muni ceṣṭitam

original: bhasmasmeraśarīratā pṛthujaṭābandhaḥ śiromuṇḍanaṃ kuṇḍī daṇḍakamaṇḍalupraṇayitā carmākṣasūtragrahaḥ /
analyzed: bhasma smera śarīra tā pṛthu jaṭā bandhaḥ śiraḥ muṇḍanam kuṇḍī daṇḍa kamaṇḍalu praṇayi tā carma akṣa sūtra grahaḥ

original: kāṣāyavyasanaṃ nirambararuciḥ kaṅkālamālādhṛtiḥ kāmakrodhavaśādviśeṣaruciraṃ sarvaṃ vṛthaiva vratam // KDarp_7.68 //
analyzed: kāṣāya vyasanam nirambara ruciḥ kaṅkāla mālā dhṛtiḥ kāma krodha vaśāt viśeṣa ruciram sarvam vṛthā eva vratam
darpa utkopāt paraṇita jaṭā sūtra bandhat ca mohāt antar sīdat sa rasa viṣaya āsvāda saṃvāda saṅgāt

original: āśāpāśavyasananicayādvāsanālīnadoṣān naiṣāṃ muktirbhavati tapasā kāyasaṃśoṣaṇena // KDarp_7.69 //
analyzed: āśā pāśa vyasana nicayāt vāsanā līna doṣāt na eṣām muktiḥ bhavati tapasā kāya saṃśoṣaṇena

original: ityuktaṃ tripurāriṇā girisutā śrutvā yathārthaṃ vaco niścitya vratamapraśāntamanasāṃ mithyaiva kāyakṣayam /
analyzed: iti uktam tripurāriṇā girisutā śrutvā yathārtham vacaḥ niścitya vratam apraśānta manasām mithyā eva kāya kṣayam

original: saṃsāroparamāya moharajasaḥ śāntyai munīnāṃ paraṃ rāgadveṣavimuktaye ca dayayā cakre harasyārthanām // KDarp_7.70 //
